!files.name: saved_email.txt
content: To: [mailgroup: All]
From: Alfonso Polaris
Subject: IMPORTANT! instabilities
it seems some of the higher systems are becoming unstable, likely to do with the increasing time shifts
to keep the environment up we must take action immediately
erik: please use the 'upspin' command to get the systems dependencies back up. use my clearance password if necessary
jean: make sure that the gps coordinates of the parsolineal locations remain intact. I moved them to the P drive for now
others: monitor all systems and help where you can. report anything out of the ordinary
those files that must not fall into the wrong hands, I will backup and purge.
see you all soon
